txt.en: 'Perhaps they are here to pay recompense for their ancient wrongs.'
'Unlikely, not dwarves, you know as well as I. Dwarves are miserly creatures in gold and compliments and apologies.'
'Have you heard of the parties of dwarves and Men that are Elrond's guests?'
'I have, what do you think they are here for?'
'It is not for us to question.'
'Of course, but still I must wonder at it...a large group of dwarves in Imladris after so much time.'
